#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
     int n;
     cin>>n;
     int m=n;
     int sum=0;
    for(int i=0;n!=0;i++)
   {
    sum+=n%10;
    n=n/10;
     }
    
  double p=pow(2,sum);
  long q=(long)p;
  
  cout<<m*q<<"\n";
}
return 0;
}
